EAV1Profile    
EH264AdaptiveTransformMode    
EH264EntropyCodingMode    
EH264PacketizationMode Packetization modes are defined in RFC 6184 section 6 Due to the structure containing this being initialized with zeroes in some places, and mode 1 being default, mode 1 needs to have the value zero.  
EH264Profile Easy to understand user facing profiles from the T-Rec-H.264-201304 spec there is another enum in CodecUtilsH264 that aligns the profiles with PIC and constraints however users are not expected to understand those ones.  
EH265Profile Easy to understand user facing profiles from the T-Rec-H.264-201304 spec there is another enum in CodecUtilsH265 that aligns the profiles with PIC and constraints however users are not expected to understand those ones.
